types:type.name: routes_bapi_example
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type routes_bapi_example = Array<{| companyCode: String, originLocation: {| locationCode: String, locationDesc: String |}, destinationLocation: {| locationCode: String, locationDesc: String |}|}> {"example": "[{\\\"companyCode\\\":\\\"TransNational\\\",\\\"originLocation\\\":{\\\"locationCode\\\":\\\"BEN-SG\\\",\\\"locationDesc\\\":\\\"Buena Vista Singapore\\\"},\\\"destinationLocation\\\":{\\\"locationCode\\\":\\\"KLG-MY\\\",\\\"locationDesc\\\":\\\"Klang Malaysia\\\"}},{\\\"companyCode\\\":\\\"TransNational\\\",\\\"originLocation\\\":{\\\"locationCode\\\":\\\"BEN-SG\\\",\\\"locationDesc\\\":\\\"Buena Vista Singapore\\\"},\\\"destinationLocation\\\":{\\\"locationCode\\\":\\\"KLG-MY\\\",\\\"locationDesc\\\":\\\"Klang Malaysia\\\"}}]"}

types:type.name: db-resources
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type db_resources = Array<{| companyName: String, originLocationCode: String, destinationLocationCode: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"companyName\\\":\\\"TravelOnTip\\\",\\\"originLocationCode\\\":\\\"BEN-SG\\\",\\\"destinationLocationCode\\\":\\\"KLG-MY\\\"},{\\\"companyName\\\":\\\"TravelOnTip\\\",\\\"originLocationCode\\\":\\\"BEN-SG\\\",\\\"destinationLocationCode\\\":\\\"KLG-MY\\\"}]"}

types:type.name: travelontipexamples
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type travelontipexamples = Array<{| availableSeats: Number {"typeId": "int"}, departureDateTime: String, travelRoute: {| destinationLocation: {| locationCode: String |}, originLocation: {| locationCode: String |} |}|}> {"example": "[{\\\"availableSeats\\\":50,\\\"departureDateTime\\\":\\\"2023-02-14T14:17:40\\\",\\\"travelRoute\\\":{\\\"destinationLocation\\\":{\\\"locationCode\\\":\\\"KLG-MY\\\"},\\\"originLocation\\\":{\\\"locationCode\\\":\\\"BEN-SG\\\"}}},{\\\"availableSeats\\\":50,\\\"departureDateTime\\\":\\\"2023-02-14T06:41:39\\\",\\\"travelRoute\\\":{\\\"destinationLocation\\\":{\\\"locationCode\\\":\\\"BL-SG\\\"},\\\"originLocation\\\":{\\\"locationCode\\\":\\\"KLG-MY\\\"}}}]"}
